entity.name: Andrew Cuomo
entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text: @NYGovCuomo Thank you.Thank you, Gov. Cuomo. I'm an Ohioan & am happy that you didn't disappear from giving daily coronavirus briefings & updates. I count on your honest, point-blank, down to earth reporting of the facts taking place in NY, other states & countries & you pull no punches.
